flawed_nl_solution:
Dave weighs 175 pounds and can bench press 3 times his body weight, so he can bench press 175*3 = <<175*3=525>>525 pounds
Craig can only bench press 20% of Dave's 525 pounds, so Craig can bench press 0.2*525 = <<20*0.01*525=105.0>>105.0 pounds
Craig bench presses 105.0 pounds and Mark does 50 pounds less than Craig, so Mark can only press 105.0-50 = <<105.0-50=60.0>>60.0 pounds

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 55.0, not 60.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
